name: Self-Repairing Machine
effect: The mage can give objects a self-repairing function. The willworker's understanding is such that he can fabricate materials that "heal" themselves by bonding with nearby molecules, atomically restructuring them in ways considered impossible to modern science. Each success allows the object to automatically recover Structure points of damage at a rate of one point per 15 minutes.

rotes.roteDescription: Even if it is utterly destroyed, an object treated with this Mysterium rote can mend itself, reconstituting out of nothing more than powder and miniscule fragments if need be. Silver Ladder mages take a different approach (Presence + Crafts + Matter) to accomplish similar ends.
